offer_summary.company_name: HSBC Service Delivery (Polska) Sp. z o.o.
offer_summary.location: hybrid work - Набір відкритий для українців
offer_summary.offer_content:
About the project: 
Some careers shine brighter than others.
If you’re looking for a career that will help you stand out, join HSBC, and fulfil your potential. Whether you want a career that could take you to the top, or simply take you in an exciting new direction, HSBC offers opportunities, support and rewards that will take you further.
Your career opportunity
As Python Developer you will contribute to all aspects of programming work—within potentially several prototyping teams — in the construction and testing of analytic platforms. You will play a key role in accelerating development of prototypes that could materially influence the process of risk analysis and risk measurement at HSBC. New platforms and methods created by Financial Engineering Business Unit will substantially improve the consistency of risk model development across HSBC, streamline the operational profile of model development projects (reducing costs and time) and reduce the risk of project failure, and dramatically improve the model deployment process.

Your responsibilities: 
 - Collaborate with other developers, data analysts and modellers and actively contribute to decision-making process in order to manage software development lifecycle.
 - Actively utilise tried and tested methods for managing the development of software.
 - Comply with the standard FIM requirements and act to minimize all aspects of operational risk such as it pertains to their role.
 - Some experience programming in a mathematical or engineering technical environment (such as MATLAB).
 - Knowledge of the more common design patterns.
 - Strong knowledge of testing principles.
 - Some experience developing in an Agile environment with preferably some experience with continuous integration practices.
 - Familiarity with algorithms for capturing and processing large datasets (i.e. Map/Reduce).
 - Some knowledge of machine learning and pattern recognition techniques.
 - Experience working with non-traditional database architectures (such as column free / NoSQL / graph-theoretic structures).


What we offer: 
 - Competitive salary
 - Annual performance-based bonus
 - Additional bonuses for recognition awards
 - Multisport card
 - Private medical care
 - Life insurance
 - One-time reimbursement of home office set-up (up to 800 PLN). Corporate parties & events
 - CSR initiatives
 - Nursery discounts
 - Financial support with trainings and education
 - Social fund
 - Flexible working hours
 - Free parking
